question: I have recently heard that using hair gel is not permissible as it contains placenta and alchohol. What is the ruling on this and do u know of any gel that does not contain placenta and alcohol.
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
We are not aware of any hair gel containing placenta and alcohol. We advise
you refer your query to SANHA at halaal@sanha.org.za

They will investigate and inform you accordingly.
